items.title: At least 81 dead and dozens missing in Texas floods as more rain looms
items.description: The death toll looks certain to rise as search-and-rescue teams brace for further storms.

items.title: Methane gas kills 12 Turkish soldiers in Iraq operation
items.description: They were searching a cave to recover the body of a comrade who had been shot in 2022.

items.title: Central Nairobi sealed off ahead of Kenyan protests
items.description: These are the latest in a wave of anti-government protests over the past year.

items.title: Watch: CCTV and phone recording shown to court in mushroom trial
items.description: Evidence shown in the trial of Erin Patterson has been shared by authorities after she was found guilty of murder.

items.title: Owners of escaped pet lion arrested after it attacks three people
items.description: Dramatic footage showed the big cat leaping over a concrete wall then pouncing on a woman in Pakistan.
